version_description: Thank you for downloading DANA! We are noticing some issues during our debut release so we update to this new one as fast as we could for you. Download DANA now and enjoy the promos within!
The new version of DANA comes with a fresh new look and improved interactivity. Download DANA now and enjoy tons of promos and discounts!

hello DANAmates we are fixing some payment related features such as :
- Fixing bug on page sessions in the application
- Fixing bug for QR payments
- Update on for the verification process
- Fixing on DANA main page

Hi TemanDANA, the new version of your app is here!
- Improved performance and stability.
- Offline Payment got easier with debit / credit card enabled.
- More sophisticated QR code refresh mechanism.
- Send Money feature got a facelift with quicker way to select fund source and contact.
- Withdraw your DANA balance easily through Cashout menu on Home page.
- Push notification, bug fixes and many more!
Update now and experience #GantiDompet with DANA!

Hi TemanDANA, version 0.5.1 is here!

- Invite your friends using the Referral Code and get a nice reward.
- Let us know your experience and feedbacks by filling User Survey.
- Now DANA can resend OTP directly to your WhatsApp during registration.
- Your account is more secure with the Logout and Change PIN feature.
- Also find various promos, insane discounts, and many other benefits!

Update now and experience #GantiDompet with DANA!

Hi TemanDANA, version 0.5.2 is finally here!

* Bugfixing some features that experience problems on the main page.
* TemanDANA can feel more secure by activating the location based feature where DANA will secure the location of your transaction.

Update now and experience #GantiDompet with DANA!

Hi TemanDANA, version 0.6.0 is here!

* Send DANA now has a fresh new look with a better experience.
* You can now Send DANA directly to a bank account.
* Complete Quests and win amazing prizes.

Update now and enjoy the #GantiDompet experience with DANA!

Hi TemanDANA, version 0.6.1 is here!

* Send DANA now has a fresh new look with a better experience.
* You can now Send DANA directly to a bank account.
* Complete Quests and win amazing prizes.
* DANA Top News brings you the most important highlights.
* Various bug fixings and improvements.

Update now and enjoy the #GantiDompet experience with DANA!

Hi TemanDANA, version 0.7.0 is here!

- Now you can Send DANA from your bank account directly to another bank account. Save your debit card to enjoy this benefit!
- You can do payment using QR even if your network connection is unstable.
- Optimized startup experience, enhanced deep linking, and performance improvements.

Update now and enjoy the #GantiDompet experience with DANA!

Hi TemanDANA, version 0.7.1 is here!

- Changing mobile number? No worries! You can keep your DANA account by simply editing your mobile number through Profile Settings.
- Now you can Send DANA from your bank account directly to another bank account. Save your debit card to enjoy this benefit!
- Request money transfer easily by sharing your request money link.

Update and enjoy the #GantiDompet experience with DANA!

TemanDANA, version 0.10.0 is available, let's check out the updates!
- Get ready for more bonuses, use your vouchers when you Send DANA!
- Relax! Using DANA App is now secured by DANA Protection.
- BCA OneKlik is here at DANA! Transactions are easier and hassle-free!
Update now and experience a more secure & convenience #GANTIDOMPET!

Teman DANA, brand new upgrades for version 1.1.0 are here!

Love to eat out with friends but don't want the hassle of manually splitting the bill? Sit back, relax and easily go dutch with our new Split Bill feature. Come explore the Nearby Me function and find DANA merchants by name, category, or location to enjoy all our latest promos.

Let's update now to get the best out of your #GANTIDOMPET experience!

A milestone reached, a new chapter begins.

Today we celebrate our evolution to DANA Version 1.0 ready to help you transact more securely & effortlessly.
- Security is our priority, and now we have multi-layers security to better protect your account.
- Introducing DANA Wallet where you can store all your payment tools. For users of DANA Business, now you can easily filter and monitor ongoing transactions.

Update now and take your #GANTIDOMPET experience to a whole new level!

Hi TemanDANA, version 0.8.0 is here!

* DANA is collaborating with Dompet Dhuafa to facilitate you to fulfil your Zakat and Donation.
* Send DANA with better experience thanks to new looks and ability to send through link.
* Request money transfer easily by sharing your request money link.

Update and enjoy the #GantiDompet experience with DANA!

Hi TemanDANA, what's in version 0.9.1?

- As one of our commitment to deliver the most secure wallet, We are updating our security system. Update your app for worry-free transaction!
- Improved the application and payment method stability

Let's update DANA for a better #GantiDompet experience!

Hi TemanDANA, what's in version 0.9.0?

* Haven't paid Zakat yet? Now you can pay through DANA!
* Need to transfer money? Good news! Now your Send DANA limit has been increased to Rp10 million.
* Hey gamers, you can now purchase Speed Drifter, Love Nikki and Hago items using DANA!
* Cutting-edge QR Scanner for lightning speed transactions with DANA!
* An update in our account recovery process to better help those changing mobile number.

Let's update DANA for a better #GantiDompet experience!

Teman DANA, brand new upgrades for version 1.1.0 are here!

Love to eat out with friends but don't want the hassle of manually splitting the bill? Sit back, relax and easily go dutch with our new Split Bill feature. Come explore the Nearby Me function and find DANA merchants by name, category, or location to enjoy all our latest promos.

Let's update now to get the best out of your #GANTIDOMPET experience!

TemanDANA, exciting features are coming your way! Get ready to enjoy fresh upgrades in the version 1.2.0:

Now, your transfer contact list will always be saved & secured even after logging out or switching phone. We have also deployed performance enhancements and bug fixes.

Let's update to version 1.2.0 now to discover a whole new #GANTIDOMPET experience!

Hi TemanDANA, exciting features are coming in version 1.3.0!

1. With our new Reminder feature, you'll never forget your bills anymore!
2. The new Services layout makes it much easier to find your favorite service.
3. Quickly find a top-up agent using Nearby Me.
4. Introducing the Promo Center. Find all the exciting promos in one place. We know you love 'em.

Update now and enjoy a better #GANTIDOMPET experience!

This update is too good to pass up!
Our 1.4.0 version has cool new features for you.

Nearby Me has a fresh new look! We added a category filter to choose from shopping, food or groceries. You can also find nearby agents for topping up balance.

Ready to upgrade? Let's update now for a five-star #GantiDompet experience!

There once lived an application that kept upgrading for your satisfaction.

In this tale, we present Payment Authentication, a system that activates PIN codes during transactions.

Out of DANA Balance? Have no fear, Nearby Me is here to find top-up agents in your area.

Special treat for shopping lovers! Login to LAZADA via DANA & get bonus vouchers.

Sharing is caring, invite friends to use DANA & win amazing prizes.

Download version 1.5.0 now for a happily ever after #GANTIDOMPET experience!

DANA 1.6.0 is here for you!
New updates, new features.

New Features
• New to the app? Relax, we'll help you through our features with easy Guides!
• Share transaction results to your friends.
• Forget your bills often? No problem, use Manage Bills to keep a personal bill reminder.
• We listen to your input. If you Forgot PIN, the account recovery process is now securely faster than ever. Take it easy!

What are you waiting for?
Update now and enjoy the best #GantiDompet experience!

We have news for you!

New Features

- Split Bill is better than ever! You can now see which participants have paid, and Scan QR to pay.
- Share transaction results to your friends.
- Our new Help Center is ready to assist you. Problems be gone!
- Send DANA looks smooth with a brand new interface.

Update now for the best #GantiDompet experience!

We have news for you!

New Features

- Split Bill is better than ever! You can now see which participants have paid, and Scan QR to pay.
- Share transaction results to your friends.
- Our new Help Center is ready to assist you. Problems be gone!
- Send DANA looks smooth with a brand new interface.

Update now for the best #GantiDompet experience!

Ho ho ho, time for some merry updates!

New Features
• We improved the scan process. Open Pay menu and directly scan. Easy!
• Embrace DANA for your lifestyle! You can now set your favorite services on the home page. Psst, we also show the related promos there.
• Who says paying your Water bill is hard? Not anymore, because we added 200 new Water providers!

Hi TemanDANA, ver 1.8.1 is here!
• Fixed bug on QR Scanner on iOS 10 and 11.

Update now and enjoy the #GantiDompet experience with DANA

Hi TemanDANA, ver 1.8.2 is here!

- Fixed bug on registration & search bar.

Update now and enjoy the #GantiDompet experience with DANA!

"New year, new me!"
It may sound cliché, but that's what we want to be.
To serve you better, starting from today!

Yee-haw!
As the first e-wallet collaborated with Apple
now you can pay with DANA
for any Apple services in Indonesia!

Don't miss out on Nearby!
Find lots of promos,
in every place you go!

There's also Manage Bills.
Never miss your monthly bills,
as checking its status is
as easy as 1, 2, 3!

Make sure to update your DANA application
and start your 2020 with a wonderful experience!

Roses are red
violets are blue
Here are new updates
made just for you!

Find the nearest DANA merchants & promos with Nearby.
We'll get you notified wherever you go!

Hooray, Gas PGN is finally here!
Pay your monthly gas bills easily with DANA!

Finally, now you can transfer money to any bank in under Rp50K (with admin fee) and still free admin fee for above Rp50K! Yippie!
See you in the next update!

Hi TemanDANA, ver 1.10.1 is here!
-Fixed some bugs.
Update now and enjoy the #GantiDompet experience with DANA!

Happiness is only real when shared.
We agree with it and now we’re proud to present to you,
our happiness-sharing feature: Feed!

Feed lets you share your activities
while seeing your friends’ activities in DANA.
How cool is that?

Update the hippest merchant you went to.
Try the latest feature your friend shared with you.
Share your referral code and get rewards too!
Every little thing is happiness worth sharing!

Ask your #TemanDANA to explore Feed
and share happiness with each other!

History is like a time recorder. It saves every special moment that we have.

DANA is back with an upgrade in Transaction History & we make it special for you.

You can filter whatever transaction you want to see; by date, payment method, even merchant! So convenient!

Sort your transaction by date too. Cashless transaction tracking made easy!

You can also cancel any of your in-progress transactions without having to wait until expired.

Let’s update & experience our special upgrade!

To be connected & stay connecting with all of you.
That’s what we want to do.

Now with the new Network Indicator, your network is easily tracked!
Red color for when it goes offline, & green when goes back online.
Have any transaction without worry, your network is protected with security!

Stay connected wherever you go!
Get an instant notification of the nearest merchants & valuable promos!

Make sure to always update DANA app!
Something special is coming
especially for the voucher hunters!

Dear TemanDANA,
please stay safe, healthy & keep your mind in peace.

For those who are #stayathome,
Now we have DANA Deals ready with vouchers of many online merchants.

You can also access the complete version of Games only on DANA website! Wohoo!

If you need any help, our Call Center is now available to be contacted in Whatsapp!

Let's update DANA app & hope everything will get better!

Dear TemanDANA,
let’s keep being positive and believing those good things are coming!

Let’s check out the new Top Up page!
Sleek design that’s more convenient!

Say hi to Parkee as our new provider to pay parking fee in DANA app!

See your Promo Quest active mission directly on the homepage.
Get an instant notification when we deliver a new mission!

For DANA Bisnis partners, leveling comes to boost your business!
Complete your store’s data & go to the top level!

See you in the next update!

Hi TemanDANA, ver 1.15.1 is here!

-Fixed bugs.

Update now and enjoy the #GantiDompet experience with DANA!

Hi TemanDANA, ver 1.15.2 is here!

We made some improvements and squashed bugs to serve a better DANA for you!

Update now and enjoy the #GantiDompet experience with DANA!

Hi, TemanDANA!
Even though we're away,
we still have new updates for you!

Now we have the catchy Nada DANA
for every push notification!

Come check on Nearby!
You can search for any merchant
based on multiple categories.

Have fun at Feed!
With the new Saymoji, you can easily
give emoji reactions to every update
made by your friends!

It's getting easy to pay with QRIS
from the merchant.
Open QRIS image with DANA,
& you can pay right away!

Let's update your DANA app
& stay #DiRumahDuluKak!

Hi TemanDANA!
Along with the New Normal, we come to serve New Updates that are too precious to be missed!

Good news for DANA Bisnis merchant!
Product Link Payment is available for you to register each of your products & share it repeatedly to customers for payment by link. Quick & easy!

More good deeds with DANA Donasi!
Find lots of social campaigns & make a donation directly using DANA. Every time is a good time to share good deeds!

What're you waiting for? Let's update your DANA app!

2020 goes by so quickly.
It seems like everything goes in a flash and got you thinking, “Did I miss something?”

Chill, we got you a summary of updates!
In Nearby, we have a special page that displays merchant’s branches.

Find the closest merchant & go right away!
Check out Send Money new look!

As it gets comfier to do transactions, now you can also share it to Feed too!
Okay, that’s all we got for now.

Don’t forget to update your DANA application so you won’t miss anything!

Hi, TemanDANA!


We squashed some bugs to serve a better DANA for you.


Update now and enjoy the #GantiDompet experience with DANA!

We will certainly keep the updates exciting for you, even though we're amid the uncertain times.
Check it out!

C'mon, let's prepare for your definite future by investing with DANA eMAS.
Buy & sell gold anytime you want using DANA Balance. Easy!

Be a reliable reviewer for merchants in Nearby!
All of the user reviews will be displayed on Nearby too!

Also, make sure to upgrade to the Premium account with ease
with new supporting documents other than KTP!

Let’s go update your DANA app!

Good news for you TemanDANA: our new version comes with awesome updates!

First, Subscriptions feature is now available for Water bill, Postpaid Data & Electricity, plus BPJS auto debit!

Second, get extra Loyalty Points by uploading your shopping receipt photo. Yippee!

Third, any purchase in DANA Deals can be shared directly to Feed to show your friends the hottest deals in DANA!

Fourth, have you tried Face Verification feature? Let’s activate now!

Alright, it's time to update your DANA app!

You know we’ll do anything for your safety & convenience, right?

In this update, we present you with the Face Verification feature for all! Even if you’re not a DANA Premium user, you still can activate it. Let’s keep your account safe, y’all!

We also give you an awesome update on the Nearby & Home Shopping feature. Now you can find any Home Shopping merchants at Nearby. Shopping just got easier & faster from merchants around you. Avoiding crowds, check!

Let’s update now!

Hi TemanDANA, ver 1.21.1 is here!

We made some improvements and squashed bugs to serve a better DANA for you!

Update now and enjoy the #GantiDompet experience with DANA!

You’re hungry & decided to order a takeaway.

The restaurant is full & you gotta wait.

15 mins. 30 mins. 45 mins. It’s nowhere near ready & you’re getting more hungry!

Thankfully, now we got EAZY Eats* in DANA! Select your favorite restaurant & food first using the app in Pick Up service. When you arrived at the restaurant, your food is also ready to go!

Psst, we also added 37 new providers for the Water feature. Let’s update your DANA app!


*Jabodetabek, Bandung & Surabaya

Small gestures, big impact.
Every little thing matters
so you can enjoy DANA app better.

In this update, we brought some improvements here and there.
You might not see it, but we’re sure you can feel it.

Let’s update and enjoy a more seamless experience in the DANA app!

Being left out is no fun
Missing what’s happening
and places that are trending

Don’t miss anything
in these new updates
Like in Nearby where you can share
your fav merchant page through a link
Go share with to your friends!

Find the most popular, best-seller vouchers
on DANA Deals without hassle
See also all valuable vouchers
from the nearest merchants around

Make sure you get all the fun things
by updating your DANA app now!

Announcement: You can now receive Request Money to the bank account!

Yes, you read it right. Use Request Money QR Bank to receive it directly to your personal bank account.

Create a QR code and share it with your friend to start Request Money. You’ll get a notification from DANA once the money is in your bank account.

You can Request Money with a maximum amount of Rp20mil. Payment for online social gatherings or weddings made eaaasy!

Let’s update your DANA app now!

DANA’s year-end checklist:
- Killed some bugs
- Made updates here and there
- Improved app performance
- Keeping the most seamless experience, especially for TemanDANA

We’ve checked all the lists, so make sure to update your DANA app to the latest version!

DANA’s year-end checklist:
- Killed some bugs
- Made updates here and there
- Improved app performance
- Keeping the most seamless experience, especially for TemanDANA

We’ve checked all the lists, so make sure to update your DANA app to the latest version!

Imagine a world where you could always pay recurring payments in time.

Well, in 2021, it is no longer an imagination!

Let’s meet Personalized Push Notification. With this feature, you’ll get notified before, during, and after your payment is due.

This way, you'll never forget to pay for your Spotify, Apple, and IQIYI account anymore! Woohoo!

No DANA Balance? Don't worry! You can switch the payment method to bank cards!

Live easy by updating your DANA app now!

It’s never too late to create new resolutions for your goals & make ‘em come true.

Let us introduce you to the amazing DANA Goals that will:
- Help you set aside DANA Balance to achieve your goal
- Let you create 10 goals max. with many categories
- Set you free from a minimum starting balance

Since security is our priority, we also give you extra protection with Trusted Device. Register & set your device as the trusted one, & manage account login from 1 device only.

Let's update now!

We believe that big things start small.

So, in this update, we hauled some small upgrades here and there!
Not only that, we also killed some bugs to improve our app’s performance.

While it may seem like nothing, but you can definitely experience the great impact it brought.

Update now and have fun with a more seamless DANA app!

I follow all the trend
That’ll keep me up to date
Let's tell all of your friends
The Credit Card feature has a new update!

Worried about the security of your credit card data? On DANA, your data is protected by PCI-DSS. It is safe, guaranteed!

While at it, enjoy the new sleek design updates so you can use the Credit Card feature more comfortably!

Let's live pleasantly by updating your DANA app now!

Love language comes in different shapes.

Some may want to give or receive gifts. Others prefer to spend hours & hours with their precious one.

Well, our love language for you guys is consistency!

We keep coming back with updates. We make sure everything runs smoothly, with no lags or bugs that will disturb your experience.

So, are you ready to feel our love language? Click update and tell us how you like that!

*For security reasons, DANA can't be used on jailbreak/rooted devices.

Hi Teman DANA! Do you believe that something great usually grows out of many small things put together?

Well, we do, and we hope you do too!

Let's say "bye" to bugs and "hello" to a better experience because we’re bringing some specific updates for you.

Mark our words, this upgrade will surely help DANA grows to be even greater than before!

So, what are you waiting for? Click the "Update" button now!

We know you miss hanging out
The conversation, the place
Spending time with family and friends
Oh, the things you don’t wanna miss out

Worry not. We can still connect digitally
through social media and even through DANA!

In Feed, now you can add a username
and it will appear in every interaction
Create your most creative one
and give comments, reviews, and also saymojis
How fun is that?

Hurry up, click the Update button
and let's connect more!

People said that “time is money,"
well, they're not wrong.
After all, it is valuable
and we must learn to cherish it.

Because of how important time is
we spent our time cleaning up
behind the scenes to bring you
the even better and faster version of DANA!

We make sure everything runs seamlessly
with no lags or bugs
so you can transact
swiftly on DANA. Guaranteed!

Are you ready to value your time with DANA?
Let's update now!

Life goes by too quickly
that we must run to catch up.
But with DANA's 3D Touch Widget
we believe you'll be able to do it just fine!

By adding DANA’s widget
you can do Top Up, Send & Request Money
and get monthly DANA transactions reports
on your phone's home screen.

Don't like adding a widget?
Try the 3D touch gesture!
Press the DANA app's icon
and do transactions on DANA just like that!

Ready to pursue your life with DANA? Let's update now!

4 Signs You're Living the #BebasDrama Life

1. Bebas Bokek. Not afraid to Send Money to another bank, it’s free of admin fees on DANA.
2. Bebas Cemas. Always be at peace, each transaction is protected by DANA Protection.
3. Bebas Gaptek. No longer get confused over scattered balance, you can combine it for payment using SmartPay.
4. Bebas Ribet. Change the payment method easily. Both DANA Balance and saved bank card can be relied on.

Live the #BebasDrama life with DANA and update the app now!
